pyneg.comms.notify module¶

pyneg.comms.notify.send_message(message)[source]¶
pyneg.comms.notify.try_except_notify(func)[source]¶

Try/Except decorator - takes as input a function, and outputs a modified version of that function whose first argument is how many times you want to re-run the function if any exception is raised. The second function is the path to a file containing the tokens used for the push notifications
